concept.title: Dashboard
concept.shortdesc: This page displays a high level overview of all cloud resources and their alarm status.

section.title: New Alarms
section.p: The New Alarms section shows you the alarms that have triggered since the timeframe indicated. You can select the timeframe using the View control with options ranging from the Last Minute to Last 30 Days. This section refreshes every 60 seconds.
section.note: In later releases the refresh rate will vary based on the selected interval but it is a static time in this beta release.
section.p: The new alarms will be separated into the following categories:

ul.li: Critical - Open alarms, identified by red indicator
Warning - Open alarms, identified by yellow indicator
Unknown - Open alarms, inditified by gray indicator
Open - Complete list of open alarms
Total - Complete list of alarms, may include Acknowledged and Resolved alarms

section.title: Alarms: Infrastructure Services
